title: Done Bali
creator_credit: Paul Cox, Tony Chapman, Kerry Negara and Negara Productions
brief_description: This program looks at the history of Bali, including the commercialisation of it’s culture, tourism and the impact of Western influences upon such things as education. It examines the role played by tourism as an agent of change, and questions the inevitability of change upon this small island.
